::?1::
?1 still repairing the ark "You know we are really lucky."

::?2::
"I guess so" wipes the oil from her forehead "I'm thankful I have you ?1 
your my greatest gift."((I'm thankful for my girlfriend that puts up with my 
brash, rude, and over confidence attitude.)

::?1::
"Yeah I'm thankful for you and all our friends and family on 
Cybertron."((I'm Thankful for my Friends the Dragons and my family.))

::?3::
"I'm just glad I have a safe heaven to run to." ((I thank god I have a home 
to run to.))

::?4::
"I'm happy to hear that I think the matrix we survived this long." ((I happy 
I got up this morning and any other.))

::?5::
"Maximal weakness but I am glad that we came to do this Little Brother." 
((I'm glad I have my little pain of a brother.))

::?6::
"I'm glad there no combat in this zone it a nice break from gunfire."
((I'm Happy there is a time for peace.))

::Koj::
"I'm Glad that Lilly purify my heart after seeing the so much evil." ((I 
think god that I managed to my mind, heart and body pure.))

::Inu::
"HMMM I guy I'm thankful for all of you Maximals, Pred and ?."
((I guess I thankful for all the people that play this you give me plenty of 
Stories to write.))
